name: aacpet
description: Download videos from various websites using this telegram bot

API_ID.description: Enter your API_ID, get it from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Enter your API_HASH, get it from my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Enter your Bot token, get it from @BotFather

CHID.description: Enter your Force Subscribe channel ID

FSUB.description: Enter your Force Subscribe channel Username without @
